node.title: Blackcaps v Bangladesh: 1st test, 5th day - Can NZ avoid defeat? - Live
node.description: All the action from the final day of the first test at Bay Oval.
node.content: ["Kia ora, good morning and welcome to Newshub's live coverage of the opening Blackcaps v Bangladesh test at Mt Maunganui's Bay Oval.", "After Devon Conway's century set the tone for New Zealand on the opening day, the tourists fought back valiantly on Sunday, wrapping up the home team's lower order cheaply and laying a strong foundation to challenge a 328-run target.", "That fight-back continued on Monday, with the Tigers batsman frustrating and denying New Zealand, earning a first innings lead of 130.", "Then Bangladesh completely flipped the match on it's head with three wickets in three overs on Tuesday evening thanks to an incredible spell of bowling from Ebadot Hossain.", "The Blackcaps will resume day five on 147/5 - just 17 runs in front with a full day of cricket to play.\u00a0", "Ross Taylor, Rachin Ravindra and New Zealand lower-order are going to need to bat out at least half the day to have any hope of saving the test match.", "Play resumes at 11am", "NZ 328 (Conway 122, Nicholls 75, Young 52, Shoriful 3/69, Mehidy 3/86)\nBangladesh 458 (Mominul 88, Das 86, Joy 78, Boult 4/85)\u00a0\nNew Zealand 147/5 (Young 69, Taylor 37no, Ebadot 4/39)", "New Zealand: Tom Latham (c), Will Young, Devon Conway, Ross Taylor, Henry Nicholls, Tom Blundell (wicketkeeper), Rachin Ravindra, Kyle Jamieson, Tim Southee, Neil Wagner, Trent Boult", "Bangladesh: Shadman Islam, Mahmudul Hasan Joy, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Mominul Haque (c), Mushfiqur Rahim, Liton Das (wicketkeeper), Yasir Ali, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Taskin Ahmed, Ebadot Hossain, Shoriful Islam\u00a0", "TAB odds: Bangladesh $1.83, New Zealand $14.00, Draw $2.07", "\u00a0"]
